name: @davidsneighbour/hugo-bin
description: Bash scripts that are used across @davidsneighbour projects.

scripts.release: commit-and-tag-version --release-as patch -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" --sign && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:major: commit-and-tag-version --release-as major -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" --sign && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release:minor: commit-and-tag-version --release-as minor -a -t "v" --releaseCommitMessageFormat "chore(release): v{{currentTag}}" --sign && git push --follow-tags origin main

author: Patrick Kollitsch <patrick@davids-neighbour.com>
